entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY LATE THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING EAST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLEAR AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS AROUND 80
